Created attachment 22094
sample that dosen't work

in some cases fop need to place text with footnote to next page, but can't do it - a footnote body must be placed in next page too, so very big space appears on current page. or something like this, its only my mind.
please see sample .fo, when you remove from it line with "111 111 111 ...." - it works!
i use fop 0.95beta on winxp, java build 1.6.0_05-b13
p.s. sample is in transliterated russian language:)
